unauthorized.message: The token provided is invalid. Please use a valid token.

email_pass_incorrect.message: Email or password is incorrect. Please double-check and try again.

email_is_verified_or_missing.message: Your email is either verified or missing. Please ensure your email status.

email_used.message: This email is already in use. Please use a different one.

email_not_found.message: Email not found. Please check the email address you provided.

invalid_code.message: The provided code is invalid. Please enter a valid code.

banned_user.message: Your account has been banned. Please contact support for assistance.

reset_password_email_has_been_sent.message: An email with password reset instructions has been sent to your inbox.

invalid_email.message: The email address you entered is not valid. Please provide a valid email.
